items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js function that flattens nested JSON objects into a single-level structure with dot-separated keys. Designed for simplicity, flexibility, and deployment as a cloud function, this utility is ideal for transforming complex JSON structures into a more manageable format.
items.title: mwfelton/flatten-json-func: A lightweight Node.js function that flattens nested JSON objects into a single-level structure with dot-separated keys. Designed for simplicity, flexibility, and deployment as a cloud function, this utility is ideal for transforming complex JSON structures into a more manageable format.

items.content_html: The Currency Converter is a web-based application that allows users to convert amounts between different currencies using real-time exchange rates. The project is built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, making it simple, lightweight, and easy to use.

items.content_html: A Node.js and Express.js-based API for creating short URLs, powered by MongoDB for data storage. This project validates URLs using both syntax checks and DNS lookups to ensure robust functionality. It supports creating, retrieving, and redirecting short URLs, making it a perfect lightweight solution for URL shortening services.
items.title: Harish010818/fcc_URL-Shortener-Microservice: A Node.js and Express.js-based API for creating short URLs, powered by MongoDB for data storage. This project validates URLs using both syntax checks and DNS lookups to ensure robust functionality. It supports creating, retrieving, and redirecting short URLs, making it a perfect lightweight solution for URL shortening services.
